content: a **danish** 1 version translated by tullemomsemor 2 crochet a danish heart in yarn two ovals are crocheted in the round in one piece with necessary slits incorporated into the pattern helpful illustration for assembly gauge is not important for the pattern but your crochet needs to be tight use a smaller hook than suggested if necessary **suggested yarns and crochet hook sizes ** fingering weight yarn + size c/2 - 2 75mm hook dk weight yarn + size f/5 - 3 75mm hook worsted weight yarn + size h/8 - 5 00mm hook 1 http //topping dk/blog/2013/10/11/flettet-julehjerte/ 2 http //www ravelry com/people/tullemomsemor
